Dialogue.Page: A cold planet and moon in a distant orbit. Signs of intelligent life are present.
Hypothesis: Tidal heating from the planet's moon may allow it to support a subsurface ocean.
A cold planet and moon in a distant orbit. Signs of intelligent life are present.
Hypothesis: Tidal heating from the planet's moon may allow it to support a subsurface ocean.
My Hearthian friend has informed me this planet is populated by a similar species, and that they possess Nomai artifacts
From them I was able to acquire a new recipe for cactus soup!
